column4: Hey everyone, I've got a question that's probably super easy to answer, but I've had no luck in solving it. I'm trying to install Ubuntu 11.04b2 on an Asus EEE 1005HA netbook, but when it gets to the keyboard-configuration part of the install, it hangs for about a minute then restarts the machine. I've tried both the standard install and the alternate install with no luck. Any ideas?
well for one thing, it's a beta
Same thing happens in 10.10 when I try to install.
